lead_paragraph: New England manager Gareth Southgate wants to make the under-achieving nation the world's top football power, however long it takes, he said in a New Year message on Sunday.
snippet: New England manager Gareth Southgate wants to make the under-achieving nation the world's top football power, however long it takes, he said in a New Year message on Sunday....

headline.main: Southgate Targets World Number One Ranking for England
headline.print_headline: Southgate Targets World Number One Ranking for England
